ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Drum model and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, nothing more fun that watching a bunch of creative people in a meeting with technical people hashing out problems. While you re at it, give me a
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:06 PM 10/12/00 -0400, Rebecca Small wrote:
>Hi all,
>
>I'm glad they fixed the tamborine, I guess my point was they could fix one
>stick in a couple of months but it's taking over 2 years to fix the first
>stick and they still make excuses? That ends to defy all logic to me. They
>just seem to be hugely choosy about their priorities, not to preach to the
>choir here. Let's start a trust fund to send them to Effective Management
>training! Talk about 7 Habits of Highly Defective People, Dr. Covey would
>have his hands full.
>
>/em waves at Slyde. I hadn't seen you much either, but I only get playtime
>on the weekends these days it seems and sometimes play my wizard. You did
>drag my mage and shaman out the BW to kill that cleric quest guy last
>weekend, Altoidus and Chubb. We were trying to talk them into joining us in
>Sebilis. Gratz on the armor! I've been trying to trade for the gloves but
>haven't had the right deal yet.
>
>I think the helm art alone proves Verant has no fashion sense, let alone the
>silly animations.
>
>Briinnia Ban'Sidhe
>Excalibur, Xegony

Ah, nothing more fun that watching a bunch of "creative" people in a
meeting with "technical" people hashing out problems. While you're at it,
give me a paper cut and pour lemon juice on it. :-)

Fashion is always in the eyes on the beholder (or whatever latest fashion
magazine is saying what fashion is). It would have been nice if we were
able to choose between 3 different styles of what our Plate Mail helm
looked like on us. Ah well.

---Windleaf
